html:
We have or first major cupset in the US Open Cup round-of-32, as USL Championship side Pittsburgh Riverhounds have knocked out MLS side NYCFC.

While it was 0-0 heading into the dying seconds of the match, the hosts utilized their numerical advantage after NYCFC went down to 10 men, scoring with the last kick of the game to pull off the cupset.

OneFootball Videos

Second-half sub¬†Beto Ydrach etched his name into Pittsburgh history with the supreme header at the back-post.

There is going to be one heck of a party in the Steel City this evening!

üì∏ Kaelin Mendez - 2024 Getty Images
